differences.actualValue: <speak>In a few words, how can I help you with your current order. You can say things like, the order was already picked up by someone else, ore, problem with customers address.</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I think you are calling about a recent fare. Is that correct?</speak>

text: <speak>I think you are calling about a recent fare. Is that correct?</speak>

agentUtterance.text: <speak>I think you are calling about a recent fare. Is that correct?</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>To request a fare review for mis-timed orders, up charges, tolls, and adjusted orders, here's what to do. First, open the app, then tap help, then tap, trip issues and adjustments. Then, tap issues with my fare, then tap on the link that says "Request a fare review". Enter your order details and submit your claim. You can also choose another link if it applies to you. Uber will review your fare, and give you a decision automatically.<break time="750ms"/> </speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

text: <speak>To request a fare review for mis-timed orders, up charges, tolls, and adjusted orders, here's what to do. First, open the app, then tap help, then tap, trip issues and adjustments. Then, tap issues with my fare, then tap on the link that says "Request a fare review". Enter your order details and submit your claim. You can also choose another link if it applies to you. Uber will review your fare, and give you a decision automatically.<break time="750ms"/> </speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>To request a fare review for mis-timed orders, up charges, tolls, and adjusted orders, here's what to do. First, open the app, then tap help, then tap, trip issues and adjustments. Then, tap issues with my fare, then tap on the link that says "Request a fare review". Enter your order details and submit your claim. You can also choose another link if it applies to you. Uber will review your fare, and give you a decision automatically.<break time="750ms"/> </speak><speak>Is there anything else I can help you with today? Or, if you're done, you can hang up.</speak>

Then, tap issues with my fare, then tap on the link that says "Request a fare review". Enter your order details and submit your claim. You can also choose another link if it applies to you. agentUtterance.text:
<speak>To request a fare review for mis-timed orders, up charges, tolls, and adjusted orders, here's what to do. First, open the app, then tap help, then tap, trip issues and adjustments. Then, tap issues with my fare, then tap on the link that says "Request a fare review". Enter your order details and submit your claim. You can also choose another link if it applies to you. Uber will review your fare, and give you a decision automatically.<break time="750ms"/> </speak>
<speak>Is there anything else I can help you with today? Or, if you're done, you can hang up.</speak>
